detail.text: NetCut is a network administrator tool that allows you to cut off the Internet access of devices connected to the same WiFi network as your device. Here are some steps you can follow to use the NetCut app on Android:  - Download and install the NetCut app from the Google Play Store. - Open the app and grant it the necessary permissions. - The app will scan your network and display a list of all the devices connected to it. - Tap on the device you want to cut off from the Internet. - Tap the 'Cut' button to cut off the Internet access for that device. - To restore Internet access for the device, tap the 'Recover' button. Note: Use this app with caution as it can be misused to disrupt the Internet access of other devices on your network.

Here are some features of the NetCut app for Android:  - Cut off Internet access for any device connected to the same WiFi network as your device. - Display a list of all devices connected to the network. - Display the device name, IP address, and MAC address of each device. - Ping any device on the network to check its connectivity. - Change the MAC address of your device. - Protect your device from ARP spoofing attacks. - Display network usage statistics. - Add devices to a trusted or blocked list. - Set a timer to automatically cut off Internet access for a device at a specified time. Note: Use this app with caution as it can be misused to disrupt the Internet access of other devices on your network.

It is important to use the NetCut app responsibly and not misuse it to disrupt the Internet access of other devices on your network. Here are some guidelines for proper use of the app:  - Use the app only for the purpose of network administration, such as to troubleshoot network issues or to temporarily cut off Internet access for a specific device.  - Do not use the app to intentionally disrupt the Internet access of other devices without a legitimate reason.  - Use the app in accordance with the terms of service and any applicable laws and regulations.  - Exercise caution when using the app, as disrupting the Internet access of other devices can have serious consequences, such as preventing them from accessing important information or services.  - Consider the potential impact on other users before cutting off Internet access for a device.  By following these guidelines, you can use the NetCut app in a responsible and ethical manner.

Here are some important tips for using the NetCut app:  - Use the app only on your own WiFi network, as cutting off Internet access on someone else's network without their permission is illegal and unethical.  - Be aware that cutting off Internet access for a device may also disrupt other services that rely on an Internet connection, such as phone calls or streaming services.  - Use the app with caution, as it can be misused to disrupt the Internet access of other devices on your network.  - Be aware that some devices, such as smartphones or laptops, may automatically reconnect to the WiFi network if their Internet access is disrupted.  - If you encounter any issues while using the app, try rebooting your device or router to reset your network connection.  By following these tips, you can use the NetCut app more effectively and responsibly.

There are a few defects that you should be aware of while using the NetCut app:  - The app may not work on some devices, especially those that are not rooted.  - The app may not be able to cut off Internet access for devices that are using a VPN or a proxy server.  - The app may not be able to detect all devices connected to the network, especially those that are using a different IP address range or are connected via a different protocol.  - The app may cause issues with your network connection or with the connectivity of other devices on the network.  - The app may not work correctly on some WiFi networks, especially those that have a complex network configuration.  - To avoid these defects, it is important to use the app with caution and only for the purpose of network administration. If you encounter any issues while using the app, it is recommended to troubleshoot the problem or seek assistance from a network administrator.
